patthana4.7:209.1: Abyākato anuttaro dhammo abyākatassa anuttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana4.7:210.1: Abyākato anuttaro dhammo abyākatassa anuttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana4.7:211.1: Abyākato anuttaro dhammo kusalassa anuttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.7:212.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana4.7:215.1: Akusalaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.7:218.1: Kusalaṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:219.1: Abyākataṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.7:220.1: Kusalaṃ araṇañca abyākataṃ araṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.7:221.1: Kusalaṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo araṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. #1
patthana4.7:222.1: Abyākataṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana4.7:223.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana4.7:225.1: Kusalo araṇo dhammo kusalassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.7:226.1: Abyākato araṇo dhammo abyākatassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana4.7:227.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre … pe … magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate satta.
